Articles.Content:
Even though I haven't done it myself yet (being that I only have the demo currently), I'm confident it can be done.

Challenge:

-Do a polar interplanetary transfer to all the planets (moons too, if you feel up to it!)

Rules:

-It does not have to be done with the same ship

-Not all the planets have to be visited in one trip

-No mods allowed.

-Post pictures of your endevors!

That's it. Everything else is open to interpritation.
